attributes.action: Look at fair pay for those in Social Care Services and not just Teachers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social Workers are damed if they do and damed if they don't. They should expect a better rate of pay to meet the demands of the job without the added stress of worrying about trying to pay rent or a mortgage. Most Social Workers in Children's services go into situations that Police will not go into alone yet the public expect social care staff to do it. It's about time this government started to realise just what social workers do. So we the under signed ask for a better rate of pay rise than 2.4%
